metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34169 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Apache Xalan Java XSLT library is vulnerable to an integer truncationissue when processing malicious XSLT stylesheets. This can be used tocorrupt Java class files generated by the internal XSLTC compiler andexecute arbitrary Java bytecode. Users are recommended to update to version2.7.3 or later. Note: Java runtimes (such as OpenJDK) include repackagedcopies of Xalan.

criterions.comment: libxalan2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
openjdk-8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
